title: Augusta County: Martha L. Roadcap to Mary C. Baylor, February 22, 1864
summary: Martha Roadcap apologizes to Mary Baylor for not writing sooner, but several of her family members were suffering from diptheria. She also describes a fire in her neighborhood that destroyed ten buildings. The letter also mentions both of her sons, John and Charles McGuffin.
keywords: Home Front, African Americans, Women, Death/Casualties, American Civil War
